posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I am looking for a Fighter Monk SD build that will get me the most AC
I found a couple of builds that might give me that but I was wondering if the was a way to get Naked 40 AC
at level 40

Suggestions?

Starting stats should be 

12 str
16 Dex
12 Con
14 int
14 wis
8 chr

Thanks in advance

David

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Just off the top of my head, if you go with fighter10/ sd5/ monk25 for epic dodge & maximum number of attacks with 16 bab pre-epic, you will get something close to that but not exactly 40 ac. Let's try some calculations here...base (10) +8 (tumble) +2 (armour skin) +5 (monk) +2 (wisdom) +11 (dexterity) equals 38 ac. Now you can further optimize the stats, so with an Elf character we can start with 18dex/ 16wis and finally get to 40 ac naked at forty level.

Next. ;)
